item.title: 3. Adding a Sales Pipeline - Kanban
item.description: Learning Aim: Introduce Kanban / Card view. Power of dropdowns on fields. Show how easy to add graphs. Show off the advanced UI elements of aB Prerequisites: User to have watched “Capturing Company and Contact details” video. Understand relational data Introduction In this step of our guide we going to look at adding a dropdown field to “control” data input as we want to set up a Kanban board approach to managing Sales Opportunities.
